name: Necrotech Thunderer
description: The Necrotech Thunderer is a massive, undead creature known for its imposing presence. It has high hit points and remarkable strength, which it uses to create chaos on the battlefield.
memorable: With its ability to deal double damage to structures and powerful area effects, it poses a significant threat to foes unprepared for its strength.
goals: To cause havoc on the battlefield and destroy structures.
relations: Often encountered along with other undead creatures or employed by evil necromancers.
environment: Typically found on battlefields, especially during sieges.
strengths: High hit points, powerful melee attacks, and immunity to several damage types.
weaknesses: Limited speed makes it vulnerable to ranged and magical attacks.
attacks: Uses Trample attacks to deal heavy bludgeoning damage and has ranged necrotic abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Concentrated Shot allows it to affect multiple targets with significant necrotic damage and possibly cause exhaustion.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without relying on vision.
skills: Has average perception skills, able to detect hidden foes effectively.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage
Resistant to nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Advantage on saving throws against turn undead effects
Does not require food, drink, or sleep, allowing for relentless pursuit
Can perform multiattack with two Trample attacks
test_queries: massive undead creature with siege capabilities
slow but powerful monster that destroys structures
undead monster that can trample foes
monster with blindsight and high strength
